segments.text: Good evening , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How would you like your Bourbon , straight or on the rock ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are , sir . Bourbon with iced water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Now how much do I owe you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The bourbon is 15 dollars plus 10 % service charge . So the total is 16.5 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is OK . Here is 20 dollars and you can keep the change .
segments.speaker: S2
